paragraphs.body: The tiger monkey is a chimerical ${link_0} that inhabits the ${link_1}.
paragraphs.text: The tiger monkey is a chimerical creature that inhabits the Fire Nation.

paragraphs.body: The tiger monkey is bipedal in appearance, possessing the body of a monkey and the fur of a tiger. It has orange skin with large, cream-colored patches on its stomach and legs, as well as a long, thin tail. There is a line of light skin running from eye to eye and black stripes streak across its scalp between large round ears that jut out of its head. It also possesses long claws on its hands and feet and large fangs that protrude from its mouth. When sitting, the tiger monkey crouches on its hind legs and extends its front-most arms, with its tail resting upright.

There is a line of light skin running from eye to eye and black stripes streak across its scalp between large round ears that jut out of its head. It also possesses long claws on its hands and feet and large fangs that protrude from its mouth. When sitting, the tiger monkey crouches on its hind legs and extends its front-most arms, with its tail resting upright.

paragraphs.body: The tiger monkey is a hybrid of a tiger and a monkey.
paragraphs.text: The tiger monkey is a hybrid of a tiger and a monkey.

paragraphs.body: ${link_0} won a tiger monkey doll while at the ${link_1}.
paragraphs.text: Zuko won a tiger monkey doll while at the Ember Island Arcade.
